caption.title: List of GO terms used to predict protein association with the E. coli cell envelope.

tr.th: Gene ontology term (Associated with cell envelope)

tr.td: Anchored component of external side of membrane
Anchored component of periplasmic side of outer membrane
Extrinsic component of periplasmic side of plasma membrane
Integral component of cell outer membrane
External side of cell outer membrane
Intrinsic component of cell outer membrane
Extrinsic component of cell outer membrane
Intrinsic component of external side of plasma membrane
Intrinsic component of periplasmic side of plasma membrane
Intrinsic component of periplasmic side of cell outer membrane
Intrinsic component of cytoplasmic side of plasma membrane
